div.p: The MetadataResource serves as the base type for resources that carry publication metadata:

ul.li: They have a canonical URL (note: all resources with a canonical URL are specializations of this type)
They have version, status, and data properties to help manage their publication
They carry metadata about their use, including copyright information

div.p: As an abstract resource, this resource is never created directly; instead, one of its descendant resources (see List of Resources) is created.

div.div:
Boundaries and Relationships
This resource extends the base DomainResource. The following resources specialize this type:
[%canonical-resources%]
